confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete all the cached files and images? This will not affect saved files for offline.
encryption_description: Files are encrypted/decrypted right on this device, even the server itself cannot get access to non-encrypted content of paranoid-encrypted files. Encryption method is AES256.
delete_encryption_key_success: The encryption key was successfully deleted.
encryption_export_description: To access encrypted files on other devices/browsers, export the key and then import it on another device/browser.
key_not_found_in_file: Could not find a key in this file
import_encryption_key_success: The encryption key was successfully imported
need_to_set_encryption_key: To start using encryption of uploaded files your need to set any encryption key.
delete_key_description: Attention! You'll no longer be able to decrypt encrypted files on this device unless you import this key again.
download_confirm: Are you sure you want to download this key?
already_have_key: You already have the key(s) for this email
already_have_keys: Keys which are already in the system are greyed out.
confirm_delete_pgp_key: Are you sure you want to delete OpenPGP key for $email?
offline_information_is_not_available: This information is not available when you're offline.
information_is_not_available: This information is not available at the moment.
set_any_encryption_key: You have enabled encryption of uploaded files but haven't set any encryption key.
need_an_encryption_to_share: You need an encryption key to share files.
has_PGP_public_key: Selected recipient has PGP public key. The file can be encrypted using this key.
has_no_PGP_public_key: Selected recipient has no PGP public key. The key based encryption is not allowed.
key_will_be_used: The Key based encryption will be used
password_will_be_used: The Password based encryption will be used
encrypted_using_key: The file is encrypted using $user's PGP public key. You can send the link via encrypted email.
encrypted_using_password: If you don't send email now, store the password somewhere. You will not be able to recover it otherwise.
confirm_delete_file: Are you sure you want to delete $file
decrypt_error: An error occurred during the decryption process. Perhaps, this file was encrypted with another key.
file_is_damaged: Error happened. Perhaps this file is damaged.
please_wait_until_loading: Please wait until the file finishes loading
need_an_encryption_to_uploading: You need to set an encryption key before uploading files.
upgrade_your_plan: Mobile apps are not allowed in your billing plan.
please_upgrade_your_plan:
Mobile apps are not allowed in your billing plan.
Please upgrade your plan.
enter_host: Could not detect domain from this email, please specify your server url manually.
encrypted_mail_using_key: You can send the link and the password via email.
send_email: You can send the link via email.
sign_with_not_key: $data can’t be signed because the private key has not been added.
sign_data_with_not_key: Will not sign the $data because you don’t have pgp private key.
sign_mail_with_not_key: The $data will not be signed because you don’t have pgp private key.
password_sign: For password-based encryption the pgp-signing is not supported.
email_signed: The email will be signed using your private key.
data_signed: Will sign the data with your private key.
copy_password:
You can send the link via email. The password must be sent using a different channel.

You will be able to retrieve the password when need.
copy_encrypted_password:
You can send the link via email. The password must be sent using a different channel.

  Store the password somewhere. You will not be able to recover it otherwise.
encrypted_sign_using_key: The file is encrypted using $user's PGP public key. You can send the link via digitally signed encrypted email.
email_not_signed: The email will not be signed.
two_factor_auth:
Your account is protected with
Two Factor Authentication.
Please provide the PIN code.
